CustomField.formula: if(Erbbauzins__c == NULL , (Surface_Object_sqm__c * Rent_Long_Term_sqm__c)*12 / (Purchase_Price_sqm__c * Surface_Object_sqm__c), ((Surface_Object_sqm__c * Rent_Long_Term_sqm__c)*12 - (Surface_Object_sqm__c*Erbbauzins__c)*12) / (Purchase_Price_sqm__c * Surface_Object_sqm__c))
CustomField.label: Rendite in %
